Dialogue.Page: I was an author of Translation and Patches for The Outsider, and this addon has already been integrated into The Outsider.
My main contribution was making Japanese translations of some mods, and I also made some jam mods: Finis, Guardian, and Diorama. (The time difference issue makes me hesitate to join some team.)
.....Of course, I know I should reboot Pick Up Chert. This is the time.
